title: book_The_Grace_Awakening
text:
ISBN-13: 9780849911880.
ISBN-10: 0849911885.
Title: The Grace Awakening.
Subtitle: Believing in Grace Is One Thing. Living It Is Another.
Authors: Charles R. Swindoll.
Categories: Religion.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=GZ0aPwAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Swindoll calls all Christians to wake up and reject living in legalistic, performance-oriented bondage. He urges readers not to miss living a grace-filled life since freedom and joy--not lists, demands, and duties--await all who believe in the Lord Jesus Christ..
Published Year: 2006.
Average Rating: 4.33.
Number of Pages: 306.
Ratings Count: 1987.
